featured.text: The situation worsened when the industrial production of vodka began in the country, causing its prices to drop sharply and making it available to even low-income citizens.
One of __(34)__ measures is to calculate the percentage of income that people spend on certain necessities.
But income is not distributed __(36)__ throughout its population.

definition.zh_def: 收入，指個人或家庭在一定時間內所獲得的金錢或財產。
definition.en_def: Money received, especially on a regular basis, for work or through investments.
definition.example: Her monthly income allows her to save for a vacation.
